entry.title: A Simple, Secure and Powerful Application for One of the Leading Banks in Mongolia
entry.summary: Supporting the institution’s growth objectives by centralizing the CRM system with an all-in-one growth marketing tool.

entry.title: Creating a Holistic Solution for Mongolia’s Largest Conglomerate
entry.summary: With its companies operating separately, this conglomerate was missing opportunities for growth. Learn how they fostered business synergies and a customer centric approach with this “one tool to rule them all.”

entry.title: Refocusing the Customer Journey with erxes
entry.summary: Elevating the customer journey by effectively managing data, customer support, marketing, and sales team with a single tool – erxes.
